en.purpose: To prognosticate the severity of multiple myeloma based on serum β2 microglobulin and albumin levels.
en.use:
Use to prognosticate the severity of multiple myeloma based on serum β2 microglobulin and albumin levels. The ISS differentiates patients into 3 separate prognostic groups: 

Stage	Criteria
I	        Serum β2 microglobulin <3.5 mg/L AND serum albumin ≥ 3.5 g/dL
II	        Either: serum β2 microglobulin <3.5 mg/L, but serum albumin <3.5 g/dL
                OR
                serum β2 microglobulin 3.5 – 5.4 mg/L irrespective of the serum albumin
III	        Serum β2 microglobulin ≥5.5 mg/L
en.misuse: Not to be used in patients with relapsed myeloma, smoldering myeloma or MGUS.
